caption: At night, in a tall building, there's a table with many people seated around it. Next to them stands a chubby man in white attire. He shares some information with them, his expression even more exaggerated and unrestrained. Many who heard this news appear terrified, but they're soon forced to use an item, and their vision starts to blur before they faint. A woman manages to escape and seems intent on writing something on paper. However, she's quickly discovered by the man. Later, she forgets everything and seeks out a detective, seemingly wanting him to piece together the past events. She hands the detective a piece of paper, and he starts to inspect it carefully.
